text: HCD or hcd may refer to: == Design == * Human-Centered Design - an approach to problem solving, commonly used in design and management frameworks that develops solutions to problems by involving the human perspective in all steps of the problem- solving process ==Science and technology== * Higher-energy collisional dissociation, an ion fragmentation technique * Hectocandela (hcd), an SI unit of luminous intensity equal to 100 candelas * Host controller driver, for a host controller interface; for example Host controller interface (USB, Firewire) ==Other uses== * HCD Research, developers of MediaCurves * HC Davos, a Swiss ice hockey club * California Department of Housing and Community Development, US * Human-centered design, a design and management framework ==See also== * Host controller interface (disambiguation)
title: HCD
